page.title: 08Stoke Albany-Amenities 2
page.content: As well as the one post box in the wall of the post office, there is also a telephone box in the main street. In the village there are two bus stops with shelters. There are two express buses per day. On Tuesday the bus comes five times because it is market day in Market Harborough. On any other day it runs four times a day. The householders take turns to hold a whist drive each week which are very popular with the senior citizens.An art class and Womens Institute meeting are also held at the widely used village hall.
